title: Decision Australia
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, Bank of New South Wales and John Kingsford-Smith
brief_description: A promotional film aimed at British residents. Shows an English family who have applied to emigrate to Australia under the Assisted Passage Scheme. Shows the many attractions of Sydney.
